languages.text: "Абеляр прав. Пусть старшины невольников прекратят этот бардак, иначе пожалеют".
"Abelard is right. Have the convicts' leaders stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."
languages.original_text: "Абеляр прав. Пусть старшины невольников прекратят этот бардак, иначе пожалеют".

languages.text: “阿贝拉德说得没错。命令那些囚犯领班停止骚乱，否则他们会后悔的。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the convict foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德说得没错。命令那些囚犯领班停止骚乱，否则他们会后悔的。”

languages.text: «Abelard tiene razón. Que los capataces de esclavos paren este lío, o se van a arrepentir».
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the slave foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard tiene razón. Que los capataces de esclavos paren este lío, o se van a arrepentir».

languages.text: 「アベラルドは正しい。奴隷の職長にこの混乱を止めさせるんだ。さもなくば、奴らは後悔することになる」
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the slave foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルドは正しい。奴隷の職長にこの混乱を止めさせるんだ。さもなくば、奴らは後悔することになる」

languages.text: « Abélard a raison. Arrangez-vous pour que les chefs d'équipe des esclaves fassent cesser cette pagaille, sans quoi ils vont le regretter. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the slave foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."

traits.locale_text: « Abélard a raison. Arrangez-vous pour que les chefs d'équipe des esclaves fassent cesser cette pagaille, sans quoi ils vont le regretter. »

languages.text: "Abelard hat recht. Die Sklavenvorarbeiter sollen diesem Irrsinn ein Ende setzen, sonst werden sie es bereuen."
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the slave foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard hat recht. Die Sklavenvorarbeiter sollen diesem Irrsinn ein Ende setzen, sonst werden sie es bereuen."

languages.text: "Abelard haklı. Bu kepazeliği mahkûmların önderleri sona erdirecek, aksi hâlde pişman olacaklar."
languages.original_text: "Abelard is right. Have the convict foremen stop this mess, or else they are going to regret it."
